thread.title: Xbox One Controller's Wireless PC Adapter Coming This Month
thread.title_full: Xbox One Controller's Wireless PC Adapter Coming This Month

title: Xbox One Controller's Wireless PC Adapter Coming This Month
text:
Xbox One Controller's Wireless PC Adapter Coming This Month 
Published By: Gamespot.com - Today 
The adapter that allows Xbox One controllers to be used wirelessly with PCs and tablets is coming later this month, Microsoft has confirmed....
